【胡乃文開講】古人怎麼保養皮膚？教你古代皇后級皮膚美白法

03 Nov 2019, 14:54

以中醫的觀點來說，「皮膚是五臟六腑的鏡子」，大多數的東方女性認為皮膚白皙，看起來就漂亮、健康。在古代，皇后貴妃為博得皇帝的寵愛，也十分注重身體各部位的保養，使得自己「面白脫如雪，身光白如素」。
那麼，古人是如何保養皮膚的呢？胡乃文中醫師教你古代皇后和民間女性的護膚美容法！



──轉自《大紀元》

[Hu Naiwen opened the lecture] How did the ancients maintain the skin? Teach you the ancient queen skin whitening method

03 Nov 2019, 14:54

From the point of view of traditional Chinese medicine, "the skin is a mirror of the internal organs." Most oriental women think that the skin is fair and looks beautiful and healthy. In ancient times, the empress of the emperor was favored by the emperor, and he also paid great attention to the maintenance of various parts of the body, making himself "white as a snow, as white as a body."
So how does the ancients care for the skin? Hu Naiwen Chinese medicine practitioner teaches you the skin care and beauty of ancient queens and folk women!
